item.description:
Since the Pour House event has to be rescheduled due to the tragic events, this is an alternative. We will celebrate the arrival of Spring with a Grand Tasting at a wonderful site overlooking beautiful Boston harbor.

The theme is the wines of Northern Italy and Austria. There will be  four very special guests who will be showing their fine wines. Total of 28 wines (Red and White). This event is free and sponsored by the Federal Wine & Spirits. We hope you can make it.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Free Grand Wine Tasting!
